title: LayoutConfig
description: Configuration for UI layout structure, defining grid systems, responsive breakpoints, spacing rules, and component arrangement patterns. Controls visual organization of the interface.

type.description: CSS layout mode governing element positioning and flow, per CSS Flexbox/Grid specification.

alignContent.description: CSS align-content property value, per CSS Flexbox/Grid specification.

alignItems.description: CSS align-items property value, per CSS Flexbox/Grid specification.

justifyContent.description: CSS justify-content property value, per CSS Flexbox/Grid specification.

justifyItems.description: CSS justify-items property value, per CSS Grid specification.

stickyPosition.description: Anchor edge for CSS position:sticky elements, per CSS Positioning specification.

style.description: Visual presentation style applied to the layout container.

labelPosition.description: Placement of form field labels relative to their input elements, per HTML 5.3 label element positioning patterns.
